Title: Our latest 22 kW EV Charger for Ultra-Modern EV Charging
EV_Content: Our latest 22 kW EV Charger for Ultra-Modern EV Charging About us Products HARDWARE PRODUCTS statiq Circle AdWall CCS Charger 22 KW Charger 60kW Dual Gun NECTAR SOFTWARE PRODUCTS Whitelabel Solution CSMS VIEW ALL SOLUTIONS Partner with us Contact Us Locate Charger AC CHARGER 22 kW Compact, Quick & convenient charging solution for EVS Talk to an Expert Sleek and compact form factor, and connectivity with the Statiq App make for an ultramodern charging experience, every time! 22 kW is an elegant & compactly designed yet powerful AC Charger generating an output of 22 kW! Equipped with a Type2 connector, makes it ideal for 4-wheeler charging Applications. Auto Cut-off IP54 Certified IOT enabled WiFi Enabled Bluetooth Enabled RFID enabled SMART CHARGING Ensures connectivity in all situations with WIFI, 4G Sim, Ethernet, and Bluetooth. Always online through a battery backup system enabling remote diagnostic even during power outages SIMPLE CHARGING Can be mounted on either a wall or a pole SAFE CHARGING Surge protection, earth leakage protection, and overcurrent Why Statiq 22 kW is perfect for you ? Hassle free overnight charging experience. Auto cut-off on charging completion Over-the-air software update Real time charging data monitoring Network connectivity via 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi & Ethernet Partner with Us Looking to Host the Statiq 22 kW? It has one 22kW type 2 gun for charging of Electric 4 wheelers. Got More Questions?
